basic.description:
The growth of French Canada since the early nineteenth century and the development of its relations with the rest of the country.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: French Canada, 1830-2000

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
